Title: The Apprentice
Writer: Nathan Auerbach, Daniel Berg, Benjamin Bocquelet (creator), Louise Coats, Mic Graves, Phil Whelans, Tobi Wilson
Actors: Jacob Hopkins, Teresa Gallagher, Dan Russell, Tamia Cerrate
Plot: Gumball sets out to prove to Penny's father that he's good enough for his daughter. Gumball decides that the best way to prove to Mr. Fitzgerald that he's good enough for Penny is to become...
